snippet.title: Zelda Expansion Release trailer
snippet.description:
Note: These are the original 64DD dungeons that Master Quest is based from. There are differences, between the layouts and puzzles. 

The team and I are very happy to present to you the Zelda Ocarina of Time Expansion mod. We have labored tirelessly over the gigaleak sifting through info and found the original DD layouts for the dungeons. We have ported that data and added some additions to help make the experience as complete as possible! These are some of the most challenging dungeons and we hope you enjoy them! As for the trailer, I have purposely avoided showing off most of the dungeon areas/puzzles so you can enjoy the surprise of going through them yourself. More info is in the readme included with these patches!

Both English and Japanese patches for 1.0 Ocarina of Time roms, You need to provide your backup rom as the patches are NOT roms nor can be played without them. 

You can download the updated BPS files here:
https://github.com/ZethRyder/Disk-Expansion/releases

Thanks to Luigiblood, we now have a DISK version of the release. While the rom version will be the more definitive edition with the enhancements/bug fixes. The Disk version will give you the purest experience of what you would of gotten with an expansion disk for the 64DD. With the Disk release, you can play it with any NTSC N64 rom, 1.0, 1.1 and 1.2. You can check out the disk version and the emulator/files needed to get it running here:

https://64dd.org/news/2021-12-20-zeldaexp.html

Happy 35th Anniversary to such a great series!
